name: Rossignol X8 Skate FW - Women's
description: Recreate and train in these mid-range, performance boots. Their precise, enveloping fit offers good support, twist resistance, and control through each phase of your stride. The women’s-specific fit includes the lower leg as well as the foot, delivering more power, precision and comfort.World-cup speed lace pull system.PVC lace covers with asymmetric zip, frees your instep for comfort.Polyester thermo-adjustable inner liner.3-D plastic reinforcements in the heel for pressure control and wear-resistance.Sport sole (NNN compatible) is stable and provides a precise kick with good boot-to-ski contact.
